test.name: Verificar se ao preencher os campos do formulario corretamente os dados são inseridos na lista e se um novo card é criado no time esperado

kw.name: Dado que eu acesse o organo
Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Dado que preencha os campos do formulario
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Returns URL to placeholder image Example: http://placehold.it/640x480

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então identificar o card no time esperado
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
